name: Ferratum Oyj
goal:
Ferratum Oyj, headquartered in Helsinki, Finland, is an international provider of unsecured ?financial technology". Its business is designed for easy and transparent loans to consumers and can be accessed through the internet or mobile devices. Ferratum Bank Ltd, one of the subsidiaries of Ferrratum Oyj, is a licensed credit institution with a banking licence in Malta which is used via cross-border provision of services in several EU member states.
More info about Ferratum Oyj at www.ferratumgroup.com.
interests: Consumer Affairs, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union
